abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-600?}}|{{Ability|Great Life Drain Beam|0-300?|element=lifedrain}}|{{Ability|Ultimate Earth Explosion|150-270? (green life drain sprite) |element=earth}}|{{Healing}} }}
sounds: ZHE TIME OF ZHE SNAKE HAZ COME!
name: Snake God Essence
location: East of [[Zao]] and south of [[Dragonblaze Peaks]], two floors below [[Zalamon]].
strategy: Trap him as fast as you can, knights will have to use challenge a lot since he tend to switch very often. [[Fire Bomb|Fire]] and [[Energy Bomb]]s will be helpful.
